data.name: HSBC Platinum Credit Card
data.description: Earn HSBC Rewards Plus points on your everyday spend to redeem for cashback, e-gift cards and more.

bundles.name: HSBC Home Loan

features.additionalValue: Enjoy Domestic and International Travel Insurances with Rental Vehicle Excess Insurance in Australia, Transit Accident Insurance, Extended Warranty Insurance, and Purchase Protection Insurance. discounts.description: The annual fee is $149 and subject to change. However, it will be waived in the first year (i.e., the annual fee is $0 in the first year).
discounts.additionalInfo: The annual fee is $149 and subject to change. However, it will be waived in the first year (i.e., the annual fee is $0 in the first year). The annual fee will be debited for the first time on the first statement of account following the 12-month anniversary of the first debit transaction on your account, and annually thereafter. The waiver ($0 annual fee in the first year) does not apply to existing HSBC customers transferring from another HSBC credit card.

fees.name: Overlimit Arrangement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when your informal request for a credit limit increase is agreed.

fees.name: Late Payment Reminder Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on or after the day an amount is due for payment and has not been paid.

fees.name: Overseas Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you make a transaction on your account in a currency other than Australian dollars, or you make a transaction on your account in any currency (including Australian dollars) that is processed/billed by either the merchant or its financial institution/payment processor outside of Australia.

fees.name: Cash Advance Usage Charge
fees.additionalInfo: The higher of $4 or 3.0% of the total transaction amount (including any fees and charges imposed by us or a third party to effect the transaction). The cash advance usage charge forms part of the cash advance balance.

fees.name: HSBC Payment Fee (via Post Billpay)
fees.additionalInfo: Charged by HSBC when you make a payment at Australia Post.

fees.name: Cheque Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When you make a cheque payment to us using Post Billpay and it's dishonoured.
